author: IBM Technology
description:

🔍 Linux powers everything from servers to supercomputers and IoT devices! Martin Keen breaks down Linux’s kernel, distros, and modularity, showing why it’s perfect for DevOps, hybrid cloud, and secure workloads. Discover how this open-source OS shapes modern computing across industries!

title: What Is Linux? From Kernel to IoT, DevOps, & Supercomputers
